section.title: Introduction
section.p: This documentation describes the Quantum GIS (QGIS) application. Further information on QGIS is available at http://qgis.org.

Internationalization for several languages
Snapshot mode (invoked from command line)

ul.li: Installation Guide - How to build and install QGIS
User Guide - A brief guide to using QGIS

section.p: All documents are available in PDF format in the qgis share/doc subdirectory. If you have the Adobe PDF plugin for your browser, you can display the PDF version by clicking on the PDF link in the upper right corner of each document.
section.note: This documentation is based on QGIS 0.2 (Pumpkin)
